23// ===================== MEDIA MOVIL =====================
31class MediaMovilMulti {
32public:
38 void init(int n_sensores, int ventana) {
39 n_ = n_sensores; win_ = ventana;
40 if (win_ > 10) win_ = 10; // límite igual al código original
41 for (int i=0;i<n_ && i<3;i++) {
42 idx_[i]=0; count_[i]=0;
43 for (int j=0;j<win_;j++) buf_[i][j]=0.0f;
44 }
45 }
46
51 void actualizar(float* nuevos, float* out) {
52 for (int i=0;i<n_ && i<3;i++) {
53 buf_[i][idx_[i]] = nuevos[i];
54 idx_[i] = (idx_[i]+1) % win_;
55 if (count_[i] < win_) count_[i]++;
56 float suma=0.0f; for(int j=0;j<count_[i];j++) suma+=buf_[i][j];
57 out[i] = suma / count_[i];
58 }
59 }
60private:
61 int n_=3; int win_=3;
62 float buf_[3][10];
63 int idx_[3]; int count_[3];
64};
65
66// ===================== KALMAN SIMPLE =====================
72class KalmanMulti {
73public:
80 void init(int n, float Q, float R) {
81 n_ = n; Q_=Q; R_=R;
82 for(int i=0;i<n_ && i<3;i++){ x_[i]=0.0f; P_[i]=1.0f; }
83 }
84
89 void filtrar(float* z, float* out) {
90 for(int i=0;i<n_ && i<3;i++) {
91 P_[i] += Q_;
92 float K = P_[i] / (P_[i] + R_);
93 x_[i] = x_[i] + K*(z[i]-x_[i]);
94 P_[i] = (1 - K)*P_[i];
95 out[i] = x_[i];
96 }
97 }
98
103 void forceState(float* z, float P_init){ for(int i=0;i<n_ && i<3;i++){ x_[i]=z[i]; P_[i]=P_init; } }
104 void setQ(float Q){ Q_=Q; }
105 float getQ() const { return Q_; }
106private:
107 int n_=3; float Q_=0.01f; float R_=1.0f; float x_[3]; float P_[3];
108};
109
110// ===================== LIMITAR VARIACION =====================
119inline void limitar_variacion(float* dist_actual, float* dist_prev, float* out, int n, float max_delta) {
120 for(int i=0;i<n;i++) {
121 float delta = dist_actual[i]-dist_prev[i];
122 if (delta>max_delta) delta=max_delta; else if (delta<-max_delta) delta=-max_delta;
123 out[i] = dist_prev[i]+delta;
124 }
125}
126
127// ===================== VECTORES / TRILATERACION =====================
128inline float v_norm(const float* v,int sz){ float s=0; for(int i=0;i<sz;i++) s+=v[i]*v[i]; return sqrtf(s);}
129inline void v_sub(const float* a,const float* b,float* r,int sz){ for(int i=0;i<sz;i++) r[i]=a[i]-b[i]; }
130inline void v_add(const float* a,const float* b,float* r,int sz){ for(int i=0;i<sz;i++) r[i]=a[i]+b[i]; }
131inline void v_scale(const float* v,float k,float* r,int sz){ for(int i=0;i<sz;i++) r[i]=v[i]*k; }
132inline float v_dot(const float* a,const float* b,int sz){ float s=0; for(int i=0;i<sz;i++) s+=a[i]*b[i]; return s; }
133inline void v_cross3(const float* a,const float* b,float* r){ r[0]=a[1]*b[2]-a[2]*b[1]; r[1]=a[2]*b[0]-a[0]*b[2]; r[2]=a[0]*b[1]-a[1]*b[0]; }
134
142inline void trilateracion_3d(const float sensor_pos[3][3], float* dist, float* out) {
143 float P1[3]={sensor_pos[0][0],sensor_pos[0][1],sensor_pos[0][2]};
144 float P2[3]={sensor_pos[1][0],sensor_pos[1][1],sensor_pos[1][2]};
145 float P3[3]={sensor_pos[2][0],sensor_pos[2][1],sensor_pos[2][2]};
146 float r1=dist[0], r2=dist[1], r3=dist[2];
147 float p2_p1[3]; v_sub(P2,P1,p2_p1,3); float d=v_norm(p2_p1,3); float ex[3]; v_scale(p2_p1,1.0f/d,ex,3);
148 float ey_dir[3]={0,1,0}; float ey[3]; v_scale(ey_dir,1.0f/v_norm(ey_dir,3),ey,3);
149 float ez[3]; v_cross3(ex,ey,ez);
150 float p3_p1[3]; v_sub(P3,P1,p3_p1,3); float i=v_dot(ex,p3_p1,3); float j=v_dot(ey,p3_p1,3);
151 float x=(r1*r1 - r2*r2 + d*d)/(2*d);
152 float y=(r1*r1 - r3*r3 + i*i + j*j)/(2*j) - (i/j)*x;
153 float z2 = r1*r1 - x*x - y*y; float z = z2<0?0:sqrtf(z2);
154 float t1[3],t2[3],t3[3]; v_scale(ex,x,t1,3); v_scale(ey,y,t2,3); v_scale(ez,z,t3,3);
155 v_add(P1,t1,out,3); v_add(out,t2,out,3); v_add(out,t3,out,3);
156}
157
158// ===================== ANGULOS =====================
164inline float angulo_direccion_xy(float* pos_tag) {
165 float x=pos_tag[0]; float y=pos_tag[1];
166 float ang = atan2f(x,y) * 180.0f / PI; // mismo signo que original
167 return ang;
168}
169
172inline float desenrollar_angulo(float previo, float actual) {
173 float delta = actual-previo; if (delta>180) delta-=360; else if (delta<-180) delta+=360; return previo+delta; }
174
175inline float limitar_cambio(float previo, float actual, float max_delta){ float d=actual-previo; if(d>max_delta)d=max_delta; else if(d<-max_delta)d=-max_delta; return previo+d; }
177inline bool debe_corregir(float angulo,float umbral){ return fabsf(angulo)>umbral; }
179inline float calcular_umbral_dinamico(float dist,float umin,float umax,float dmin,float dmax){ if(dist<=dmin)return umin; if(dist>=dmax)return umax; float f=(dist-dmin)/(dmax-dmin); return umin+f*(umax-umin);}
180
181// ===================== SUAVIZADO VELOCIDAD =====================
185inline float suavizar_velocidad_avanzada(float v_act, float v_obj, float acel, float desacel){
186 if (v_act < v_obj){ float delta=v_obj-v_act; float paso=acel; if(paso>delta) paso=delta; return v_act+paso; }
187 if (v_act > v_obj){ float delta=v_act-v_obj; float paso=desacel; if(paso>delta) paso=delta; return v_act-paso; }
188 return v_act;
189}
190
191// ===================== DIFERENCIAL =====================
192inline float clip(float v,float mn,float mx){ if(v<mn) return mn; if(v>mx) return mx; return v; }
196struct VelocidadesDiferenciales { int vel_izq; int vel_der; float giro_normalizado; };
203inline VelocidadesDiferenciales calcular_velocidades_diferenciales(float v_lineal,float angulo_relativo,float max_v){
204 VelocidadesDiferenciales r; r.giro_normalizado=clip(angulo_relativo/30.0f,-1.0f,1.0f);
205 float vel_der_f=clip(v_lineal*(1.0f-r.giro_normalizado),0,max_v);
206 float vel_izq_f=clip(v_lineal*(1.0f+r.giro_normalizado),0,max_v);
207 r.vel_der=(int)vel_der_f; r.vel_izq=(int)vel_izq_f; return r;
208}
